name: struct-fu
description: Yet another node.js struct implementation (object↔︎buffer conversion)

scripts.test: npm run-script lint && npm run-script check-types && jest
scripts.closure: google-closure-compiler --warning_level VERBOSE lib.js --js_output_file lib.min.js --language_in ECMASCRIPT5_STRICT --language_out ECMASCRIPT5 --module_resolution NODE
scripts.prepare: npm run test && npm run build

author: Nathan Vander Wilt
